loc2.description: The hideous whistling fills your ears. Pass a Will(-1) check or lose 2 Sanity.
loc2.name: City of the Great Race

loc1.name: R"lyeh
loc1.description: The night stars change and the brazen temple doors open, pouring forth a vast, black corpulence. Roll a die and lose that much Sanity.

other.description: The sky is spinning. Pass a Will(-2) check or pass out and stay here next turn.
